Chicken Dim Sum is a savory dumpling filled with seasoned minced chicken, steamed to perfection for a delicate, flavorful bite.
Tandoori Chicken Tikka is a popular appetizer featuring succulent chicken pieces marinated in spiced yogurt and grilled to smoky perfection.
Tandoori Chicken Wings are tender, juicy wings marinated in a blend of spices and yogurt, then grilled to a smoky, charred finish.
Tandoori Paneer Tikka is a delicious vegetarian dish made with paneer cubes marinated in spiced yogurt and grilled until crispy and smoky.
Tandoori Tangadi is a flavorful dish of chicken drumsticks marinated in aromatic spices and cooked to perfection in a tandoor.
Veg Dim Sum is a tasty assortment of bite-sized dumplings filled with a flavorful mix of vegetables, steamed to perfection.
Butter Chicken is a rich and creamy dish featuring tender chicken cooked in a smooth, spiced tomato-based gravy.
Dal Makhani is a creamy and rich North Indian dish made with slow-cooked black lentils and kidney beans, seasoned with aromatic spices and finished with butter and cream.
Mutton Roghan Josh is a flavorful Kashmiri dish featuring tender mutton cooked in a fragrant, aromatic curry with a blend of spices and yogurt.
Paneer Butter Masala is a rich and creamy dish featuring soft paneer cubes cooked in a flavorful tomato-based gravy with butter and aromatic spices.

Angoori Gulab Jamun consists of soft, bite-sized dumplings soaked in aromatic sugar syrup, offering a deliciously sweet and indulgent treat.
Hot Chocolate Brownie is a decadent, warm, and fudgy chocolate dessert, served with a rich, gooey center for the perfect indulgence.
Moong Dal Halwa is a rich and aromatic Indian dessert made from ground yellow lentils, ghee, sugar, and cardamom, cooked to a warm, smooth consistency.
